page.title: 14A Patchway Family's Day
page.content: I usually get up first and wake my sister up. We get dressed and go in the garden to play tennis till 8.00am when the rest of my family wake up. Then my mum makes breakfast and then we eat it and start to play tennis again, whilst my mum washes up and my dad studies. My brother watches me and my sister playing tennis. At dinner Tom, Alice and I then eat our dinner and mum and dad too. After dinner the whole family sit down and watch television, then my dad goes up and studies for the rest of the day, while I have a bath. After that my brother has a bath and then my sister. My mum then makes tea and we all sit down to eat it. We then all go to bed.
